page.title: 08 ROSS FARM
page.content: A typical farm of the area is { {Ross Farm},situated to the west of the Hull-Beverley road in the parish of { {Woodmansey}. The farm is actually two farms-an old farm and a newer one. It consists of five full time staff looking after 24 cattle, about 350 sows and about 4000 pigs on 100 acres of land. In use are three tractors, a JCB digger, four tipping trailers and six straw trailers. To keep the livestock through the winter about 20 000 bales of straw and hay are needed. Four acres of concrete are set aside for a workshop, a tractor shed and pig sheds.
